page.title: 09LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are many sports grounds and 4 golf courses in the area. Leisure activities seem to be very important to the community which lives here. The golf courses are Coombe Wood, Coombe Hill, Malden and Royal Wimbledon.{Coombe Hill Golf Course}was opened in 1911 and was designed by a course architect called Abercromby. Among famous people who have played there are Jimmy Tarbuck, Henry Cooper, Sean Connery and Bob Hope. An interesting feature of the{Coombe {Wood Golf Course}lies between the 13th and 18th fairway. It is a brick hut which was used in 1514, in Henry VIII's reign,as part of the works supplying water to Hampton Court Palace. During the Second World War a big shed was used for searchlights and a bomb was dropped in front of the 5th
